original_text: While Jehu was executing judgment on the house of Ahab, he found the officials of Judah and the sons of Ahaziah’s relatives, who had been attending Ahaziah, and he killed them.
korean_text: 예후로 하여금 아합의 집을 심판하게 하실 때에 유다 방백들과 아하시야의 형제들의 아들들 곧 아하시야를 섬기는 자들을 만나서 죽였고

sentences.original_text: While Jehu was executing judgment on the house of Ahab
sentences.korean_translation: 여호야가 아합의 가문에 심판을 집행하는 동안

sentences.original_text: he found the officials of Judah
and the sons of Ahaziah's relatives
